website_summaries.verdict: The heel is the only thing that's sensible about these kicks. These gladiator-style sandals have a low heel but are no less show-stopping than the stiletto options.
pros: Lace-up design makes these sandals extremely adjustable
They come in a variety of colors
Leather upper with lace tie closure

customer_reviews.title: Dress up Gladiators that make legs look hot!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely require a more labor-intensive tie up than the zipper-backed gladiator sandals I usually wear, but worth the effort! They’re casual, but the silver-plated heel and velvet really stress it up and make for a sexy sandal.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I brought my size 61/2 but to small beautiful sandals I decide to keep for my nice,
customer_reviews.author: Eun

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love the design and very comfortable. This brand tends to run small. I’m a size 8, and had to go a full size up for these sandals. It’s probably just European sizing. 8=39
customer_reviews.author: keitha

customer_reviews.text: I actually got snake print but I wanted tan. Cute sandals I might buy a second pair in tan (the color I originally wanted).
customer_reviews.author: Marta de Tuya

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Width is fully adjustable, which is great. Just wear the laces tighter or looser for a custom fit. These sandals are beautiful. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: TorontoMom

customer_reviews.title: Cute, for dainty feet.
customer_reviews.text: These were cute on my friend with tiny feet, but as an average size 8.5 they made my foot look extremely long likely due to the very flat sole, so back to Amazon they went!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Love "Em
customer_reviews.text: Once I got them on....looks great. I takes a minute to unloosen the straps to get the shoe on but once I did I didn't want to take them off--cute and stylish! It's a grest sandal to keep up with the latest fashion because its a shorter gladiator and the strings are not going all the way to your knees.. I'm 49 and 5'9 and I get many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty shoes. little slippery on the bottom. bought anti slipper pad and fixed the problem
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautifully made and create a great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautifully made and create a great, polished, yet relaxed look. I took what another reviewer said and sized up a 1/2 size, and I am so happy I did. I normally always wear an 8, but I ordered an 8-1/2 and they fit perfect, the 8 would have been slightly too small for the length of my foot. Gorgeous shoes, just size up a half size!!
customer_reviews.author: Extra

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was dyed black and the dye rubbed off all over my hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Can't believe I found them for such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: ShoeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size when ordering these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I found the shoes to run small. Overall I really luv the style of the shoes. I ended up ordering two more pair but in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Rafiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous shoes I absolutely love them. They're definitely comfortable but I wouldn't want ...
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous shoes I absolutely love them. They're definitely comfortable but I wouldn't want to wear gladiators that high all day
customer_reviews.author: carolinec

customer_reviews.title: 100% AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: The reviewer who claimed these are not genuine based on metal color is inaccurate. Schutz made some colors with silver heels & most with gold heels. THESE ARE AUTHENTIC SCHUTZ SANDALS! I will be purchasing in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: These are not authentic Schutz. Be aware. Pay ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not authentic Schutz. Be aware. Pay attention to the sole color and the heel color. Heel color should be gold not silver.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I expected
customer_reviews.text: The style of the sandals is cute. But never order the "clay" color. It is cheaper but it is cheaper for a reason. It's almost pink not more nude like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The color of the pic is a tan suede that i selected but i received a brown color. The picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gladiator Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful suede sandals. Can be a little difficult to get on. Perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SCHUTZ Women's Erlina Lace Up Sandals
product_meta.description: Gladiator sandal with lace up detail
